p: Intraclass correlation coefficient of the imaging diagnosis was 0.82. Interobserver agreement was reached in 13 dogs with IMDE and 19 with ANNPE. The only statistically significant difference between the two groups was days of hospitalisation, which was longer in dogs with IMDE (P = 0.028; median and IQR 3 (1‐5) vs 8 (1‐15).
